TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_stained_glass_pane
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 21}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass", "quantity": 59, "index": 30}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass", "quantity": 6, "index": 32}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 42, "index": 34}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 32, "index": 35}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 5, "index": 40}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 57, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a lime_stained_glass_pane, I need to place 3 lime_stained_glass in a row. Since there are 6 lime_stained_glass in slot 32, I will move one to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1
